title: OCE lag spikes?
body: im not sure weather its my end or riots, but the last 2 days ive been getting lag spikes. the game will be running fine then all of a sudden my character will instantly appear to jump a distance and my ping will go up to 300+ and back again in about half a second, happens every 40 or 50 seconds on average. it appears to me that my games graphic ignore my input for 0.5secs then snap to what i pressed during that time. not sure if that is packet loss or lag spikes or if it is at my end. my internet connection is via wifi but is extremely good. no jitter and -40 ping usually. any suggestion or help would be appreciated.

replies.body: I decided to try plugging my pc directly into the router via a wire instead and it works perfectly now. The strange thing is my internet speed and performance is still the same as the wifi was flawless. No other game has improved. It seems lol specifically dislikes wifi connection.

>im not sure weather its my end

*uncontrollable snickering*

But seriously, some other people are also having these sorts of issues. It might be best just to wait it out until it's done. If you want to try something, ask me.
